title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Accelerating Frontier AI w/ Foundational Platform Architecture Elements (AIM282)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过基础平台架构元素加速前沿AI (AIM282)
abstract: Hear Capital One share its battle-tested platform insights for enabling the rapid, secure, and well-governed deployment of generative and agentic AI solutions across the enterprise, including: Building enterprise AI platforms on EKS and Ultraclusters for a robust, scalable solution with flexible and low maintenance features to maximize engineering resources. Engineering a secure enterprise developer environment with Claude Code, using Bedrock to accelerate developer velocity and unlock agentic coding capabilities. Leveraging Amazon services to advance LLM training and inference capabilities, accelerating and supporting customized use cases. This presentation is brought to you by Capital One, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 聆听Capital One分享其经过实战验证的平台洞察，了解如何在企业范围内快速、安全且治理良好地部署生成式和智能体AI解决方案，包括：在EKS和Ultraclusters上构建企业AI平台，提供强大、可扩展的解决方案，具备灵活和低维护特性，最大化工程资源利用。使用Bedrock构建安全的企业开发者环境，配合Claude Code加速开发者效率并释放智能体编码能力。利用Amazon服务推进LLM训练和推理能力，加速并支持定制化用例。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Capital One提供。
